Un clasico, no hay con que darle. El gameplay es solido, los graficos aunque anticuados tienen un sentimiento nostalgico. Simplemente perfecto
Un juego muy recomendado que trae muchos detalles que se puede mejorar y poner modos en diferentes servidores.

Timeless game!!
LONG LIVE CS 1.6

edit: truly best game ever ;D playing it since 2006

very old yet very nice and very hard.
jogo muito bom, relembrei da minha infancia.

better than csgo but totally worse than minecraft
esta bien para pasar el rato aun que ya te viejo pero igual pasas el rato
Чисто классика, больше не чего сказать!

First online multiplayer game I've played in my life. During this time world was evolving, nobody had mobile phones,  best internet was 250 kbps dail-up, Napster was life, msn messenger was life ( google, facebook, ebay don't exist), DVD don't exist used to have VHS movie of The Last of the Mohicans and tape cassette of Metallica justice for all... ,  . ..  I was playing  cs 1.5 . . . suddenly world technology evolved so huge and so fast . . . . Then my online gaming addiction started with this game . . . . I used to be so pro because wallhack, aimbot those shit didnot even exist when I started everyone was clean and geniune, whoever was smart and practised shooting aim and was clam were the ones that ruled the game, I used go rule this game . . . then more people started playing it became worldwide and like always game was ruined with you know what human are best at doing . . . destroying the actual genuine fun. although bad things came with it good things also came and esports was born then slowly slowly it grew bigger little by little now. . . im a old man and I see esports so huge , my kids playing all these competitive games makes me smile and sometimes I wonder . . . I was born too early or else I would be one of the world renowned pro player or maybe technology and esport was huge during my time. . .  anyway this game is a must play for anyone who wants a taste of the orginal godfather founder of online game, esports and competitive scene. . . .  I will make my dream come true one day and kids don't do drugs . . esp Heroin, I've seen it destroy lives . . do whatever you want in life but never touch drugs, once you do it it will always be in your life no matter what you do or become, one is too many thousand is never enough. have fun playing this game and keep dreaming big but also work towards your dream.
t sustum mavi arabanın yanındaki kırmızı balon tutan cocuk

Классная графонистая игра. Любая игра считается графионистой, в зависимости от железа, на котором в неё играют. Ставьте лайк, если у вас до сих пор кинескопный моник, огромная бесформенная клавиатура и 1 мб оперативки. За ностальгию 10/10. Игру конечно же рекомендую.
Прикольно играть по локалке в той же самой школе на уроках информатики. Весит мало, не требовательна, стрельба приятная, что ещё нужно о ней говорить?
te voy a violar pendejo de mierda

win10系统走两步闪退的话，把输入法改成英文就行了。
